pages.text: There is no question that, despite the lack of light, there must once have been a lot of activity down here. But you found nothing more than ruins. What had happened? Surely you can find clues to their whereabouts? Demise? Legacy?

checklist.spectrum:lategame/revive_black_sludge_pl: What happened in the Forlorn Caves?

pages.title: Clue: Forlorm Caves
pages.text: The remains growing in $(l:dimension/forlorm_caves)Forlorm Caves$(/l) were actually Resonant Lilies, once. What happened here? Does that mean...
